Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 260 SSC Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 05, 2025, 09:53 IST
 Indian Navy
 260 Jobs |  Posted On : 05-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 110,000 to 110,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Navy has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 260 Executive Branch, Naval Air Operations Officer, Pilot, Logistics, Naval Armament Inspectorate Cadre, Law, Education, General Service, Naval Constructor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, MBA, M.Sc, MCA, B.Sc, LLB can apply for the Indian Navy Recruitment 2025. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Executive Branch	57	B.E./B. Tech 
Pilot	24
Naval Air Operations Officer	20
Air Traffic Controller	20
Logistics	10	B.E./B. Tech, MBA, B.Sc, MCA, M.Sc
Naval Armament Inspectorate	20	B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical, Electrical Engineering
Law	02	LLB
Education	15	M.Sc., B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech
General Service	36	B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering.
Naval Constructor	56

Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on

Written Test.
Interview.
Merit List.

Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 1,10,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Indian Navy Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Indian Navy Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	09-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Link	Click Here
